rukus.text: 104|1|vinaash ho us vyakti ka, jo kachoke lagaata rahata hai aur chaute karata rahata hai.
104|2|jisane dhan ekatr kiya aur use gin-gin kar rakha.
104|3|kya vah samajhata hai ki usaka dhan use sansaar mein sada rakhega
104|4|kadaapi aisa nahin hoga. vah avashy hee haî€¼utama mein phenka jaayega.
104|5|aur tum kya jaano ki haî€¼utama kya hai
104|6|vah allaah kee bhadakaee huee agni hai.
